NICE GAME, NEED IMPROVE ON VAC

Its pretty good. Lots to learn but the knowledge is rewarded. It better to play with friends with similar goals in game. Just try not to be toxic as the game will sort you with other toxics and by extension, cheaters. Once you're in that pit its fucking hard to get out. Roadblocks are common at certain ranks but as long as you play consistently good you will rank up in time. Community servers provide you hella practice or casual fun times.  The game is thriving and won't be dying any time soon. Unless Valve makes a sequel. There's a reason that the core game play has stayed the same throughout each title for over 20 years.  Best of luck.
Зря валв сделали игру бесплатной, не добавив при этом нормальный античит. Читеров примерно столько, сколько и честных игроков, очень не доволен работой Валв.
